author: Steve Chalkley
comment: Update 8 Mar 2016. Still using this app a lot and it's really great. One wish though. Would it be possible to have a dynamic vertical axis range when looking at the barometric graph? The reason being that changes in pressure between 900 hPa and say 1030 hPa don't really show much at all on a graph with scale range 0 to 2000. Still a great app, though this would make it perfect!

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Hi Steve, Thanks for such a great feedback. We are releasing ability to calibrate in a week with next update. Please share us on social. Thanks.

title: Well done!

author: Neil Young
comment: Fav compass app for my wear. Would look forward maybe in the next update for the dev to add a setting for smoother compass animation even if its the cost of extra batt life )
title: Really nice

author: Jared Korth
comment: Looks like a nice tool for Wear, although nothing works on moto 360 sport, and I know my watch has these sensors
title: No support for moto 360 sport

author: george carnahan
comment: Doesnt work on 360 second gen. Spent 2 for nothing?

author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
comment: Does not have any sensor information for the new Motorola sport 360

author: George GBo
comment: Superb app with superb functionality.  Could you please make a watch face with these features ?

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Thank you for your great feedback, we are working on a watch face as well.

author: Norm Anderson
comment: Just learning to use great so far
title: Works OK

author: Kevin Cole
comment: Indispensable app for the lg watch.

author: Tho Truong
comment: Spent money for altimeter and barometer functions but cannot get any other displays to swipe up as shown in their youtube video.  I cannot get to the screen that shows altimeter display or to calibrate anything but the compass like in their youtube video.  I have a brand new Sony Smartwatch 3, and it works for all other apps so far.  Compass works ok but I had a free compass app that worked fine.

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Hello Dear Tho, please read the app description, section #IMPORTANT.  If the watch does not have a built in barometric pressure sensor, than those screens will be hidden. Please reconsider giving 1 star. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Can only get compass -REFUND PLEASE

author: Slava G.
comment: Very good app,  after calibration of the altimeter it 5 stars app. Using it in my hikings.  Thanks for the dev team.

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Hi Slava thanks for your feed back, if you had any issue with calibrating compass, it is very easy. You need to open the app take the watch out of your wrist and spin the watch around 360 degrees two to three times till you see numbers changing very fast. I hope this helps. Thanks.

title: Good app

author: Beno Zidarič
comment: compass is a  it to nervous ..
title: Cool app..

author: paul hamilton
title: This is how to do an app.

author: Frederic Mottiat
comment: Great little app. I however miss a couple of features, such as : - ability to calibrate the altitude (ie set the altitude for a known location to calibrate the baro) - ability to track a compass direction (see for instance the android wear app "bearing" with tracking for north)

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Hi Frederic, Thank you for your feedback. We are working hard to bring Barometer calibration feature for the first update. Frederic, we have a vision, we think that all wear apps should work without connecting to phone. This makes it even better for survivors. We appreciate your feedback and will consider your suggestion for the following updates.

title: Great start. Could be even better

author: gokhan selamet
comment: So far only app in the store uses all sensors of my watch LG G-Watch R. All functions are working perfectly, and nice to have settings to see in Imperial units.  Now i can weather forecast with barometer on my wrist.

reply.author: Massive Robotics
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, we believe in wear technology, we keep developing dedicated android wear apps.

title: All in One

comment: Doesn't work on the moto 360 Sport
fricking confusion to get it to work accurate
